tool_description: FeedPulse is a news aggregation API that provides developers with access to a wide range of news articles from various sources. It allows users to retrieve news items based on parameters such as page number, number of items per page, and country code. With FeedPulse, developers can integrate up-to-date news content into their applications or websites effortlessly.
name: FeedPulse
title: FeedPulse

api_list.name: getFeeds
api_list.description: fetch all feeds, filter by country & category

api_list.name: getSingleFeed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://feedpulse2.p.rapidapi.com/api/feeds/489920"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "feedpulse2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://feedpulse2.p.rapidapi.com/api/feeds/489920"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "feedpulse2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
